artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: long rectangular building with purple roof; two towers at rear with purple bell shaped roofs; two shorter towers at entrance with sculptural images at base; "AR/TS" on left base; "SCI/EN/CES" on right base; purple door
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [ÉCOLE PROFESSIONNELLE]
title: École professionnelle, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
